channel.title: How to make a multi teleport portal, and NPC talk
channel.description: [size=12pt][b]How do I make a multi teleport portal.[/b] [i]Still need help with multi teleport portal.[/i][s]And how do I make the NPC when I press him say something like "Vote for UwberPwnScape!" in the the chat box (not in regular chat).[/s][i]Solved![/i][/size][b]Edit: This is for a 317.[/b] [b]Thanks for your time. -Jim[/b]

item.title: How to make a multi teleport portal, and NPC talk
item.dc:creator: @xneonx xneonx
item.description:
@xneonx wrote:

[quote=“agfy25, post:5, topic:364419”]Just to coords(x,y) I select.[/quote]Sorry this took so long to reply, was editing a 562 =). I can add the dual portal if you would like. Just send me a pm so we can get started.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a multi teleport portal, and NPC talk
item.dc:creator: @xneonx xneonx
item.description:
@xneonx wrote:

I may have something for the NPC dialogue. What you’re going to need: NPC id, Dialogue.java
First, Open up your Dialogue.java, scroll all the way down till you see your last case-something like this-case 352: c.ptalk("Sorry to hear that..", 591); break;Now here is what everything means -"…" is what you want the npc to say when you click on it. -,###) like mine was 591) that is the npc id. Just add something close to this case ###: c.ptalk("Vote for UwberPwnScape!", ###); And that should be it for the npc Dialogue.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a multi teleport portal, and NPC talk
